Sentencas: The possibility of using a mu-fan in tubular solid oxide fuel cells module (SOFC-M) is shown.
Titulo: High Temperature Micro-Fan for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Applications

Sentencas: The mu-fan is placed instead of the ejector and fulfills its role.
Titulo: High Temperature Micro-Fan for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Applications

Sentencas: The main advantages of this solution are: lower power demanded by the fuel compressor (blower), more stable working characteristics, and the possibility of more accurate control of the recycled part of the anode gas during part load operation.
Titulo: High Temperature Micro-Fan for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Applications

Sentencas: A comparison of two SOFC-Ms, with and without the ejector, is also shown and commented.
Titulo: High Temperature Micro-Fan for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Applications
